messages.message: Using `` could result in slower LCP and higher bandwidth. Consider using `` from `next/image` or a custom image loader to automatically optimize images. This may incur additional usage or cost from your provider. See: https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/no-img-element
'selectAsset' is assigned a value but never used.
'query' is assigned a value but never used.
Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.
